abstract: Days after receiving the backing of the  largest shareholder of the Australian miner Macarthur Coal, Peabody Energy and ArcelorMittal said they now had a 59.85 percent stake in the company.
snippet: Days after receiving the backing of the  largest shareholder of the Australian miner Macarthur Coal, Peabody Energy and ArcelorMittal said they now had a 59.85 percent stake in the company.

headline.main: Peabody Energy and ArcelorMittal Gain Majority of Macarthur
